news.title: Tánaiste announces safe evacuation of 52 Gazan students to Ireland
news.summary: "It's really important we find practical ways in which we can support people in Gaza and one of those ways is enabling some students to come from Gaza and study in Irish universities," the Tánaiste said.

news.title: Chappell Roan at Electric Picnic preview: Roan’s cultural footprint, meanwhile, only continues to grow, with her admirers including everyone from Elton John to Franz Ferdinand"
news.summary: After a truly extraordinary 18 months, Chappell Roan arrives at Electric Picnic as the pop superstar of the moment, with her stellar array of art-pop anthems set to go down a storm. By Paul Nolan

news.title: Album Review: The Hives, The Hives Forever Forever The Hives

news.summary: Nashville-based singer records in the famous RCA Studio A. 7/10

news.title: Fundraiser launched to honour Seán Rocks and St. Francis Hospice after benefit performance of The Weir sells out "in record time"
news.summary: All proceeds will be shared between the immediate family of Sean Rocks and the Dublin hospice.
